title: While in game screen randomly going black and freeezing, followed by a sharp FPS drop.
body: Been happening to me for about two days. Only in a League game, doesn't happen in other games or while not in game. Happens frequently, somewhere around once every 10 seconds. The game screen will randomly turn black and freeze for about half a second, followed by a strong FPS drop the half second after. It's been driving me insane and I can't figure out what's causing it. Any help is appreciated.

replies.body:
This sounds like a really poor interaction with your display driver. I strongly suggest taking a look at our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for your first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps resolved this or not.
